metadata.title: CVE-2023-28617 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: org-babel-execute:latex in ob-latex.el in Org Mode through 9.6.1 for GNUEmacs allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a file name ordirectory name that contains shell metacharacters.

criterions.comment: xemacs21: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xemacs21-packages: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
emacs24: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
org-mode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
